column3:
comment:"Quality product.

Pros: 
- uses less amount of water. More water conservation compared to conventional laundry. 
- very well packed provided with transportation locks. Reached unscratched.  
- quiet while working. Good at ears. 
- provided with quality inlet and outlet. 
- good material provided with quality power plug and adjustable feet. 
- seller is responsive and cooperative. Provided with all necessary help in installation process.


Cons: 
-Manual should be more elaborative. Took alot of time to unlock the transportation locks. Other guidelines should be more elaborative as wells. 

- Power consumption is a little on the higher sides. Should be improved keeping in view the energy efficiency. 

- water inlet size is almost an inch while domestic taps are around 1/2 inches. Should be locked into. 

- Drying element could be improved. Laundry Still needs a 10-15mins exposure of sun or open air to complete dry. 

Overall
column4: a wonderful handy machine. Worth the money (5/5). Recommended"}
